title: Redwall Boxed Set: Martin The Warrior, Mossflower, Outcast of Redwall
description: Consisting of three early stories concerning Martin and Redwall Abbey, this gift set Martin the Warrior which tells of the legendary mouse and his struggles against the tyrannical Badrang; Mossflower charting the fearsome battle Martin had with the wildcats; and Outcast of Redwall.
author: Brian Jacques
